mapper.select: select CarId, s_id, DocumentNumber, Documentdate, Documentstatus, carmagid, Phone, Amountreceivable, Deliverystatus, Completionstatus, e_id, remarks, p_id from asms.carwaslist where CarId = #{carid}

select CarId, s_id, DocumentNumber, Documentdate, Documentstatus, carmagid, Phone, Amountreceivable, Deliverystatus, Completionstatus, e_id, remarks, p_id from asms.carwaslist limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into asms.carwaslist(s_id, DocumentNumber, Documentdate, Documentstatus, carmagid, Phone, Amountreceivable, Deliverystatus, Completionstatus, e_id, remarks, p_id) values (#{sId}, #{documentnumber}, #{documentdate}, #{documentstatus}, #{carmagid}, #{phone}, #{amountreceivable}, #{deliverystatus}, #{completionstatus}, #{eId}, #{remarks}, #{pId})

insert into asms.carwaslist(s_id, DocumentNumber, Documentdate, Documentstatus, carmagid, Phone, Amountreceivable, Deliverystatus, Completionstatus, e_id, remarks, p_id) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.documentnumber}, #{entity.documentdate}, #{entity.documentstatus}, #{entity.carmagid}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.amountreceivable}, #{entity.deliverystatus}, #{entity.completionstatus}, #{entity.eId}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.pId})

insert into asms.carwaslist(s_id, DocumentNumber, Documentdate, Documentstatus, carmagid, Phone, Amountreceivable, Deliverystatus, Completionstatus, e_id, remarks, p_id) values
(#{entity.sId}, #{entity.documentnumber}, #{entity.documentdate}, #{entity.documentstatus}, #{entity.carmagid}, #{entity.phone}, #{entity.amountreceivable}, #{entity.deliverystatus}, #{entity.completionstatus}, #{entity.eId}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.pId})
on duplicate key update s_id = values(s_id) , DocumentNumber = values(DocumentNumber) , Documentdate = values(Documentdate) , Documentstatus = values(Documentstatus) , carmagid = values(carmagid) , Phone = values(Phone) , Amountreceivable = values(Amountreceivable) , Deliverystatus = values(Deliverystatus) , Completionstatus = values(Completionstatus) , e_id = values(e_id) , remarks = values(remarks) , p_id = values(p_id)
mapper.update:
update asms.carwaslist
s_id = #{sId},
DocumentNumber = #{documentnumber},
Documentdate = #{documentdate},
Documentstatus = #{documentstatus},
carmagid = #{carmagid},
Phone = #{phone},
Amountreceivable = #{amountreceivable},
Deliverystatus = #{deliverystatus},
Completionstatus = #{completionstatus},
e_id = #{eId},
remarks = #{remarks},
p_id = #{pId},
where CarId = #{carid}
